original_title: Velvet Revolver - Tierra Roja, Sangre Roja
overview: The story of rock supergroup Velvet Revolver's tour through South America. Includes live concert footage before a crowd of 80,000 fans, backstage antics, and travels including rough terrain, hail, and rabid fans.
title: Velvet Revolver - Tierra Roja, Sangre Roja
